~~打表大法好!~~  
$generator\ 1:$
```cpp
#include<stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char** args) {
	int n = 0;
	putchar('[');
	for(int p = 1;p <= 100;p++) {
		for(int i = 1;i <= p;i++) {
			if(i & 1) {
				printf("I hate ");
			} else {
				printf("I love ");
			}
			if(i != p) {
				printf("that ");
			}
		}
		printf("it");
		printf("%s", (p != 100) ? ", " : "]");
	}
}
```
这玩意打出来的表太惊人, 以至于luogu不让提交  
于是, 我说:  
	$I\ hate ==\ 1$  
    $I\ love ==\ 2$  
    $that\ == \ 3$  
    $it\ ==\ 4$  
于是:
```cpp
#include<stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char** args) {
	int n = 0;
	putchar('{');
	for(int p = 1;p <= 100;p++) {
		putchar('"');
		for(int i = 1;i <= p;i++) {
			if(i & 1) {
				printf("1");
			} else {
				printf("2");
			}
			if(i != p) {
				printf("3");
			}
		}
		printf("4");
		putchar('"');
		printf("%s", (p != 100) ? ",\n" : "};");
	}
}
```
于是:

```cpp
int main(int argc, char** args) {
	int n = 0;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for(int i = 0;a[n - 1][i] != '\0';i++) {
		if(a[n - 1][i] == '1') {
			printf("I hate ");
		} else if(a[n - 1][i] == '2') {
			printf("I love ");
		} else if(a[n - 1][i] == '3') {
			printf("that ");
		} else if(a[n - 1][i] == '4') {
			printf("it");
		}
	}
}
```

## $AC$
